Name: Cluster Production in Cochlear Implant Patients (diachronic data)
Description: This corpus contains diachronic speech recordings from three cochlear implant (CI) users. For data used in the corresponding synchronic study, please refer to the CI_2 corpora.  This corpus contains recordings used for the analysis of the temporal dynamics of the consonant cluster /Êƒtr/.
Group: Corpora with transcriptions and audio recordings
